why.card1.text: Use Trust Wallet, Metamask or to connect to the app
why.card2.text: Upload your crypto and set a title, description and price
why.card3.text: Earn by selling your crypto on our marketplace
why.card4.text: Invest all your crypto at one place on one platform
why.car5.text: Discover, collect the right crypto collections to buy or sell
why.card6.text: We make it easy to Discover, Invest and manage
join.description: Invest and manage all your crypto at one place
